attributes.action: Keep Singles Tennis and Golf and other safe activities open.
attributes.additional_details: To support peoples health both mental and physical throughout the lockdown period as the restrictions will damage peoples health and increase the load on the NHS.
attributes.background:
Allow singles Tennis to continue and
Allow singles Golf to continue,

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow golf to be played with appropriate safety measures: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557167

Allow indoor/outdoor tennis courts to operate under strict distancing protocols: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557428

You might also like to sign the following petition:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956
